name: Garden Maul 64
description:
Garden Maul 64 is inspired by the classic Warcraft 3 tower defense map Wintermaul and is made for the Low Res Jam 2022. While not feature complete we did manage to cram in 3 towers and 7 different difficulty modes. 

Creeps will travel from the left entrance to the middle yellow point, then to the right-most exit point.  You must "maze" the creeps with towers in order to survive. Find the most optimal maze and tower layout to survive at least 50 waves. 

You can use either Keyboard or Controller to play (Xbox controllers are prefered )

Arrow keys (D-Pad) = Move the cursor

Z  key (A button) = Builds current Tower

X key (B Button) = Sells tower, you get a full refund but can only sell in between waves.

C key (Y Button) = Opens the build menu. You can select towers to build from here

A key (Left Bumper) = Slows down time

S Key (Right Bumper) = Speeds up time

Enter (Start) = Begins the Wave, or Pauses time if the wave has already begun.  

Art By Garrett Deal 

Sound By Tyler "Conduit" Byers  

Programming By Avery Ruth
